arts.ttl: Leipzig bounce back from Bayern humiliation with win over Heidenheim
arts.sum: RB Leipzig bounced back from their heavy 6-0 opening defeat to Bayern Munich with a 2-0 win over Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Christoph Baumgartner brilliance helps RB Leipzig to comfortable win over stubborn Heidenheim
arts.sum: RB Leipzig put their 6-0 opening day thrashing behind them as Christoph Baumgartner's spectacular strike and Rômulo's cheeky backheel secured a commanding 2-0 victory over Heidenheim at the Red Bull Arena. After their opening day humiliation at Bayern Munich, Ole Werner made four changes to his shell-shocked side, handing first Bundesliga starts to Brazilian forward Rômulo and Dutch midfielder Ezechiel Banzuzi, while Christoph Baumgartner and Antonio Nusa also came into the starting eleven.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs. Heidenheim preview: Both teams targeting first points of the season
arts.sum: RB Leipzig and Heidenheim will both be targeting their points in the Bundesliga season when they lock horns at the Red Bull Arena on Saturday.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between RB Leipzig and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
